channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.description:
"In the fetid fleapit of Rincewind's brain the projectionist of memory put on reel two. Recollection began to flicker."

- Terry Pratchett, The Last Continent

""Early to rise, early to bed, makes a man healthy, wealthy and dead.""

Apparently Terry nicked this from James Thurber. Still a good quote, though. - Terry Pratchett, The Light Fantastic

""I mean are we talking Thicko City here or what?""

Gaspode the wonder dog - Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures

"He moved in a way that suggested he was attempting the world speed record for the nonchalant walk."

- Terry Pratchett, The Light Fantastic

"Most gods find it hard to walk and think at the same time."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods
